summary.body: I know this is not a dating agency or site , and I dont want to mis use it in anyway or form . But this may have attracted attention . I live in the Barbican , im 49 , divorced and im lonely . Im a nice chap . If there are any single ladies who are similar ( lonely ) dont hesitate to contact me dont just sit there feeling sorry for yourself . There are many in the same sad boat .
summary.subject: Professional lonely male
